name: Data storage, data management, data visualization

sessions.name: Introduction to space
sessions.description:
Introductory exercises using the Space Missions dataset. If there is no filled raw_data table, use this command to load the data:

python -m hydenv examples space

sessions.name: Normalizing space
sessions.description:
After learning and using the space dataset, it is time to improve it structurally. This paves the way for more sophisticated exercises

It is recommended to solve the Introduction to space session first.

description:
University of Freiburg

Exercises for the data storage, data management and data visualization course as part of the Hydrology master and environmental science master track.

The exercises included cover most parts of the lecture and are highly recommended.
